zone.line: And beyond Indus, & its tribute rivers,
Trampling the torrent streams & glassy lakes
And up the green ravine, across the vale
Where ever lies, on unerasing waves
The image of a temple built above.

line.del: Which bore thy name ere faith was o

zone.line: And populous with most living imagery 300
Fill the hushed air with everlasting love.
It is deserted now, but once it bore
Thy name Prometheus, and ardentthere the emulousyouths
Bore to thine honour thro the divine gloom
The lamp, which was thine emblem... even as those
Who bear the untransmitted torch of hope
Into the grave across the night of life...
Beside itthat Temple> is the destined Cave...depart!311
